skills.name: Passing Time
skills.description: Attacks 3 times and recovers 15% of the Attack Bar each time the attack lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Predicted Future
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with an 80% chance to remove beneficial effects, inflicting Continuous Damage equal to the number of removed beneficial effects for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.name: Loss of Cause and Effect (Passive)
skills.description: Removes the harmful effects if you start the turn with 2 or more harmful effects. Recovers your HP by 15% and the HP of your allies by 10% for each removed harmful effect. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill
